description.tagline: Retrieve Slack user details using their email address.
description.detailed: Use this tool to find user information in a Slack workspace by providing an email address. It requires the 'users:read.email' OAuth scope to access the email field in user objects.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: The email address of the user in the Slack workspace to be found. This should match a registered user's email.
